(879x1+0)/1 mod 4096 = 879. (879x3+1)/2 mod 2048 = 1319. (879x9+5)/4 mod 1024 = 955. (879x27+19)/8 mod 512 = 409. (879x81+65)/16 mod 256 = 102. (879x81+65)/32 mod 128 = 51. (879x243+227)/64 mod 64 = 13. (879x729+745)/128 mod 32 = 20. (879x729+745)/256 mod 16 = 10. (879x729+745)/512 mod 8 = 5. (879x2187+2747)/1024 mod 4 = 0. (879x2187+2747)/2048 mod 2 = 0. (879x2187+2747)/4096 mod 1 = 0.
